I'm Leo Tartari, a designer crazy about technology.

I have a background in Interaction Design, Information Architecture and Front-end Development.

As a career goal I am restless for improving the experience of users on web and mobile apps always focusing on clarity, ease of use, and simplicity.

With more than eight years of combined experience I have worked as a designer for companies of all sizes and domains.

I am skilled at working with agile methodologies and advocate for a leaner UX practice.

Work Experience

DUNNO (BR) MAY 2015 – PRESENT

Designing and developing for an education web app. Also working as a project manager for an all remote and geographic distributed team.

BEARCH LABS (US/BR) MAR 2015 – MAY 2015

Designing for a mobile social network app on both iOS and Android. Activities included user testing, fast prototyping and managing the project for a geographic distributed team.

DOOR2DOOR GMBH (GE) JUL 2014 – SET 2014

User testing and fast prototyping for an urban mobility mobile app on both iOS and Android. Other activities included front-end development and agile coaching.

FREELANCER SEP 2012 – JUN 2014

Designer for mobile and web apps.

DATAVIZ (BR) MAR 2013 – NOV 2013

Information designer on data visualization projects developed for civic and public interest, commissions or contests. Other activities include project management and facilitating inceptions for a couple of projects done in partnership with the Open Knowledge Foundation.

THOUGHTWORKS INC. (US/BR) APR 2011 – AUG 2012

Experience designer consultant working mainly with interface design, information architecture, and interaction design. Worked on the domains of e-commerce (for both web and mobile platforms) and travel.

EZ COMMERCE (BR) NOV 2010 – APR 2011

Information architect and interaction designer for an e-commerce platform. Introduced agile concepts on a waterfall oriented team while also helping to redesign flows for web stores. Other activities included managing a team of five responsible for the activation of new stores.

SOFTA (BR) MAR 2009 – OCT 2010

User interface and interaction designer for rich internet apps. Activities included prototyping and validating design concepts.

FREELANCER JAN 2006 – JAN 2009

Visual designer for small web projects.

Side Projects

Carona Fácil

An easy and fast way to offer or ask for a ride, putting in touch people with common destinations.

Springboarder

A collection of curated interviews about people’s home screens and apps they use on their mobile devices.

Noite Hoje

A curated list with the best concerts and parties in your town, available for iOS (both iPhone and iPad) and Android.
